verb.description: Make a feeble hissing or spluttering sound.
examples: the strobe lights fizzled and flickered

noun.description: A feeble hissing or spluttering sound.
examples: the electric fizzle of the waves

origin: Late Middle English (in the sense break wind quietly): probably imitative (compare with fizz), but perhaps related to Middle English fist (see feisty). Current senses date from the 19th century.
